search_yo_mizuki_main/4001_1001_0100_10: Thanks for stopping by! Welcome to my Pasio trial!
search_yo_mizuki_main/4001_1001_0200_10: Of course, you’re gonna take on this trial, right?
search_yo_mizuki_main/4001_1001_0300_10:
I guess we’ll be searching for ingredients in this
forest here?
search_yo_mizuki_main/4001_1001_0400_10: Yup! Then I’m gonna cook up a special dish!
search_yo_mizuki_main/4001_1001_0500_10:
But it’s not gonna be as easy as it was back on
Akala Island, OK?
search_yo_mizuki_main/4001_1001_0600_10:
That’s fine! We have [Name:PlayerNickname ]
here to help us!
search_yo_mizuki_main/4001_1001_0700_10:
Great! I see you’re ready. Then it’s time for my
Pasio trial to begin!
search_yo_mizuki_main/4002_1001_0100_10:
Looks like you got all the ingredients we need!
Time for me to get to work!
search_yo_mizuki_main/4002_1001_0200_10:
First, we’re gonna mash up the Berries and throw
them into a pot.
search_yo_mizuki_main/4002_1001_0300_10: Then, we add in the milk and curry, heat it up...
search_yo_mizuki_main/4002_1001_0400_10:
And lastly, add a bit of honey and a pinch
of spice!
search_yo_mizuki_main/4002_1001_0500_10:
Ta-da! It’s a Super Mallow Special,
ready for your tasting!
search_yo_mizuki_main/4002_1001_0600_10:
This aroma... I know a few people who would
absolutely love this!
search_yo_mizuki_main/4002_1001_0800_10: And here they are! The island kahunas!
search_yo_mizuki_main/4002_1001_0900_10: Let’s make sure we clear this last trial!
search_yo_mizuki_main/4003_1101_0100_20:
[Name:PlayerNickname ] and the rest of the
group were able to successfully complete
the trials.
search_yo_mizuki_main/4003_1101_0200_20:
The Trainers from Alola gathered to celebrate
the occasion.
search_yo_mizuki_main/4004_1001_0200_10:
Why don’t you show everyone your partner
Pokémon that helped you clear the trials?
search_yo_mizuki_main/4004_1001_0500_10:
Thanks so much, everyone! Let’s keep on doing
our best!
